definition: slight knowledge of sth/superficial acquaintance with a subject/a smattering

hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])

sentences.english: I know only a little about this matter.
sentences.chinese: 對於這件事，我也只是略知皮毛。

sentences.english: To know a little superficial knowledge about something.
sentences.chinese: 對於這件事，我也只是略知皮毛。

sentences.english: People who knows a little always like to talk the little.
sentences.chinese: 略知皮毛者總愛反覆談論那點皮毛。

definition: lit. to know one and understand half (idiom); a smattering of knowledge/dilettante/amateur
lit. doesn't (even) enter a single aperture (of one's head)/I don't understand a word (idiom)/it's all Greek to me
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
related.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: slight knowledge of sth/to know very little about a subject/a smattering
(humble expr.) of humble talent and shallow learning (idiom); Pray forgive my ignorance,...
to not fully understand/to only partly understand
lit. one scale and half a claw (idiom); only odd bits and pieces
extensive but not refined (idiom); to know something about everything/jack-of-all-trades, master of none
